betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Likely due to the Arbiter, since it seems like this character has done things everywhere in this universe, the elves worked with fluix, and possessed means to work it into a matrix composite with magical properties, a lattice interacting with both matter and energy at a macroscopic level.
Now onto the Arbiter, if indeed they were so involved with the struggle of the universe, why haven't I met them yet?
